features.title: Media Preview Window
features.description: New floating preview window appears after capturing screenshots or recordings. Copy to clipboard or save with one click.

features.title: Dynamic Trial Period
features.description: Free trial information is now fetched directly from the App Store for accurate display.

features.title: Save or Discard Workflow
features.description: Media captures are now saved to a temporary location first. Save only what you want, discard the rest.

features.title: Quick Copy to Clipboard
features.description: Instantly copy screenshots and recordings to your clipboard from the preview window.

features.title: Smoother Window Following
features.description: CosmoKit now follows your simulator at 60fps for buttery smooth attachment.

features.title: App Store Screenshots
features.description: Generate beautiful App Store screenshots with device frames and custom backgrounds.

features.title: Diagnostics Tool
features.description: New diagnostics window to help troubleshoot issues with detailed system information.

features.title: New Languages
features.description: CosmoKit is now available in English, Portuguese, and Spanish.

features.title: Improved Pro Experience
features.description: Smoother transitions and better window management for Pro features.
